Title: Yext Report Reveals AI Consumer Archetypes for Search and Commerce
URL: https://www.yext.com/press/yext-ai-consumer-archetypes-for-search-and-commerce
Date Accessed: 2025-10-14

Excerpt:
"Yext identified three AI consumer archetypes: the AI Pragmatist (52%), who values time savings but still wants human support, the Skeptic (28%) seeking transparency and proof, and the Enthusiast (20%) expecting personalized experiences. Companies must deliver clear value, responsible use, and human backup to convert skeptics into promoters." (Yext, Feb 2025)

Context: Press release summarizing research on consumer expectations when interacting with AI-powered experiences.
